title: CORRECTED-UPDATE 1-American Realty completes restating results for 2013, part of 2014
author: Reuters Staff
description: American Realty Capital Properties Inc , a commercial real estate investment trust, said it completed restating results for 2011, 2012, 2013 and the first six months of 2014.
cleaned_text: 2011, 2012 results, not will restate results for 2011, 2012)) March 2 (Reuters) - American Realty Capital Properties Inc , a commercial real estate investment trust, said it completed restating results for 2011, 2012, 2013 and the first six months of 2014. American Realty's shares rose 7.5 percent to $10.55 in premarket trading on Monday. The company, which went public in 2011, has been rocked by investigations following disclosures in funds from operations for certain periods. on Monday it had completed restating results for 2013 and the first six months of 2014, which resulted in a fall in the reported adjusted (AFFO) used by analysts and investors in evaluating the financial performance of real estate investment trusts. American Realty said AFFO for six months ended June 30, 2014 was 41 cents per share, down from the previously reported 49 cents. AFFO for 2013 was restated to 87 cents per share from $1.07. The filed delayed Sept. showed that AFFO for the period fell 7 percent year over year. American Realty also investigation the audit committee weaknesses" in its internal control over financial reporting. The company had fired its chief financial and chief accounting officers in October and the company's executive chairman, chief executive and chief operating officer stepped down in December.
